rows.label: tev000693_MSG0001
rows.name:
Get outta here, you filthy little furball!
You ate all my goddamn jerky![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0002
rows.name: This is exactly why I hate cats![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0003
rows.name:
Oh, uh...sorry if I was rude to your pet there.
I'm just a dog person, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0004
rows.name:
And say, if they can make mimeosomes of dogs,
why not make one with the brains of a military dog,
slap some armor on it, and let it explore Mira with us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0005
rows.name:
Its sense of smell would be way better than ours,
so it'd be perfect for chasing down prey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0006
rows.name:
And unlike most of the worthless humans around here,
it wouldn't go running away at the first sign of trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0007
rows.name: Well? Whaddya think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_JNK0010
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: tev000693_SEL0011
rows.name: Express fear that it would be eaten by indigens.

rows.label: tev000693_JNK0020
rows.name: Support

rows.label: tev000693_SEL0021
rows.name: Agree that it would be fun to explore Mira with a dog.

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0008
rows.name:
Yeah, I suppose war dogs have been trained to deal
with humans, but not so much tyrants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0009
rows.name: In fact, the indigens might try to target it first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0010
rows.name:
And losing a dog in the line of duty would be the
worst. Just the WORST.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0011
rows.name: I had a foxhound back on Earth, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0012
rows.name:
Little guy died when I was 10 years old, and I cried so
much you wouldn't believe it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0013
rows.name:
Of course, Phog didn't seem sad at all. He was afraid
of dogs, actually, so he never went anywhere near 'em.
...I know, right? Shocker.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0014
rows.name:
Yeah, I couldn't bear the thought of watching a dog I
loved get eaten by an indigen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0015
rows.name:
Sure, it would just be a mimeosome, but once you
name it and start caring about it, what's the difference?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0016
rows.name:
I guess we got a lot of work to do before we'll be able
to explore Mira with our pooches.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0017
rows.name:
But maybe once we've wiped all the dangerous critters
off the face of the planet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0018
rows.name:
Well, it's my day off, so I ain't lifting a finger.
But I'm counting on you to get out there and make
Mira safer, [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0019
rows.name: Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0020
rows.name: Back on Earth, I had a foxhound.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0021
rows.name:
Phog was afraid to even get near him, of course,
but me and that dog were completely inseparable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0022
rows.name:
That old boy is long gone now, but I'd sure love to
take a dog hunting again one day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0023
rows.name: But you don't wanna hear me get all sappy about that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0024
rows.name:
Anyway, I'm gonna go ask Daddy Vandham if I can
take a dog with me on deployment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0025
rows.name:
He'll probably figure out I've been drinking and dress
me down good, but I'm going anyway![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000693_MSG0026
rows.name: Wish me luck, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]
